attributes.review: Worse app I’ve ever downloaded, it’s complete foolery. The app within its self is very slow and the content within it is not 100% reliable or true. THIS APP IS A HOAX. It’s just a gate way to getting into your phones.
attributes.title: This app is a tracking device don’t trust it.

attributes.review: Took full on hours to download and there were several glitches in trying to sign in. This entire app doesn’t even give me any reliable or accurate information on this guy.
attributes.title: Haha no

attributes.review: i downloaded the app to see what was actually on it (still hate him) and saw it was just weird!!! i didn't like it at all!!!! definitely deserves all these 1 stars 🤮🤮🤮 i mean even my DOG was throwing up after seeing it!!!!!!
attributes.title: trump is a horrible person :)

attributes.review: i have no idea who this trump guy is?? i see everyone talking about it and all i can gather is that he has bad vibes✨🧚 vibes mean everything to me and i just can’t give higher than one star to a guy who just simply seems Bad and Ugly. hope this helps!!😚✨💓
attributes.title: who??

attributes.review: This app is not a good app at all I have gotten a virus on my phone within 5 minutes of me downloading it and every few times I try to open the app it kicks me out so do not download the app for your own protection from viruses.
attributes.title: Do not download

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app, I expected walls to be built and where are the walls now, I’m absolutely disappointed in the amount of effor our Cheeto president has put into thr country, hopefully we can all settle for Bernie.
attributes.title: I would give it a zero if I could

attributes.review: Do not download this app. I would not recommend it at all. It’s really meaningless and also makes my phone glitch. I was disappointed shortly after downloading it. Again would not recommend this app.
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: See, I was really looking forward to using this app, but I couldn’t figure out how. It’s symbol appeared on my home screen, but i had no idea what to do next. Do I say “open”? do I tap the top of my phone three times? I just couldn’t figure it out. Sad.
attributes.title: Sad

attributes.review: I was gonna download this app to see our orange Cheeto god✨😌But right when I downloaded it, oranges knocked on my door and pulled out knifes on me! 😳 after, I said “what do u want!” And they said chatting “PRAISE THE ORANGE GOD” I felt SOOO attacked 😔😡 then they tied me up with duck tape! 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡 I couldn’t move 😢 Then! Papi Obama came and saved me! <3 I GIVE IT 1 STAR! 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😌😌😌😌😌😌😌✨✨✨✨✨
attributes.title: Orange Cheeto 😌✨😔

attributes.review: I am IN LOVE with Trump, so I wanted to download this application to show my support. I was very disappointed with the application. There aren’t enough photos of this beautiful man, and I was hoping that there would be a whole section purely of photos of Trump. A huge dissapointment.
attributes.title: Don’t download!!
